h2_title: Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
content: The last hit he’ll try to throw you off by spinning in place before the swing, so don’t be fooled! While there’s a chance he’ll perform a flourish and sheathe his sword after this, it’s more likely he’ll try to fool you again before starting up a second combo, which comes in three quick slashes with no delay at the end.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The last hit he’ll try to throw you off by spinning in place before the swing, so don’t be fooled! While there’s a chance he’ll perform a flourish and sheathe his sword after this, it’s more likely he’ll try to fool you again before starting up a second combo, which comes in three quick slashes with no delay at the end.
